CPU / Memory / Net / Disk - CPU spent seconds in guests (VMs) - Guest
queries.describe: Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance_name=~"$node",job_name=~"$job", mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance_name=~"$node",job_name=~"$job"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: Guest - Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

queries.title: CPU / Memory / Net / Disk - CPU spent seconds in guests (VMs) - GuestNice
queries.describe: Time spent running a niced guest (virtual CPU for guest operating system)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance_name=~"$node",job_name=~"$job", mode="nice"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance_name=~"$node",job_name=~"$job"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: GuestNice - Time spent running a niced guest  (virtual CPU for guest operating system)

queries.describe: Used memory for frag

queries.title: Network Netstat - ICMP In / Out - InMsgs
queries.describe: 宿主机ICMP接收消息速率(每秒,包含错误)

targets.legendFormat: InMsgs -  Messages which the entity received. Note that this counter includes all those counted by icmpInErrors

queries.title: Network Netstat - ICMP In / Out - OutMsgs
queries.describe: 宿主机ICMP发送消息速率(每秒,包含错误)

targets.legendFormat: OutMsgs - Messages which this entity attempted to send. Note that this counter includes all those counted by icmpOutErrors

queries.title: Network Netstat - ICMP Errors

targets.legendFormat: InErrors - Messages which the entity received but determined as having ICMP-specific errors (bad ICMP checksums, bad length, etc.)

queries.describe: 宿主机ICMP接收错误消息速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP In / Out - InDatagrams
queries.describe: 宿主机UDP接收数据报速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP In / Out - OutDatagrams
queries.describe: 宿主机UDP发送数据报速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP Errors - InErrors
queries.describe: 宿主机UDP接收错误数据报速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: InErrors - UDP Datagrams that could not be delivered to an application

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP Errors - NoPorts
queries.describe: 宿主机UDP无端口接收数据报速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: NoPorts - UDP Datagrams received on a port with no listener

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP Errors - InErrors Lite
queries.describe: 宿主机UDPLite接收错误数据报速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: InErrors Lite - UDPLite Datagrams that could not be delivered to an application

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP Errors - RcvbufErrors
queries.describe: 宿主机UDP接收缓冲区错误速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - UDP Errors - SndbufErrors
queries.describe: 宿主机UDP发送缓冲区错误速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP In / Out - InSegs
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP接收段速率(每秒,包含错误)

targets.legendFormat: InSegs - Segments received, including those received in error. This count includes segments received on currently established connections

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP In / Out - OutSegs
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP发送段速率(每秒,不含仅重传段)

targets.legendFormat: OutSegs - Segments sent, including those on current connections but excluding those containing only retransmitted octets

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - ListenOverflows
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP监听队列溢出次数速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: ListenOverflows - Times the listen queue of a socket overflowed

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - ListenDrops
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP忽略的监听SYN包速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: ListenDrops - SYNs to LISTEN sockets ignored

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - TCPSynRetrans
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP SYN-SYN/ACK重传速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: TCPSynRetrans - SYN-SYN/ACK retransmits to break down retransmissions in SYN, fast/timeout retransmits

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - RetransSegs
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP重传段速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: RetransSegs - Segments retransmitted - that is, the number of TCP segments transmitted containing one or more previously transmitted octets

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - InErrs
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP接收错误段速率(每秒,如校验和错误)

targets.legendFormat: InErrs - Segments received in error (e.g., bad TCP checksums)

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - OutRsts
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP发送RST段速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: OutRsts - Segments sent with RST flag

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - TCPRcvQDrop
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP接收队列丢包速率(因缓冲区限制,每秒)

targets.legendFormat: TCPRcvQDrop - Packets meant to be queued in rcv queue but dropped because socket rcvbuf limit hit

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Errors - TCPOFOQueue
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP乱序包排队速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: TCPOFOQueue - TCP layer receives an out of order packet and has enough memory to queue it

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Connections - CurrEstab
queries.describe: 宿主机当前TCP已建立或CLOSE-WAIT连接数

targets.legendFormat: CurrEstab - TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Connections - MaxConn
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP连接总数限制(动态为-1)

targets.legendFormat: MaxConn - Limit on the total number of TCP connections the entity can support (Dynamic is "-1")

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP SynCookie - SyncookiesFailed
queries.describe: 宿主机无效SYN Cookie接收速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP SynCookie - SyncookiesRecv
queries.describe: 宿主机SYN Cookie接收速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP SynCookie - SyncookiesSent
queries.describe: 宿主机SYN Cookie发送速率(每秒)

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Direct Transition - ActiveOpens
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP主动打开连接速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: ActiveOpens - TCP connections that have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Direct Transition - PassiveOpens
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP被动打开连接速率(每秒)

targets.legendFormat: PassiveOpens - TCP connections that have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Stat - established
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP处于ESTABLISHED状态的连接数

targets.legendFormat: established - TCP sockets in established state

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Stat - fin_wait2
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP处于FIN_WAIT2状态的连接数

targets.legendFormat: fin_wait2 - TCP sockets in fin_wait2 state

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Stat - listen
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP处于LISTEN状态的连接数

targets.legendFormat: listen - TCP sockets in listen state

queries.title: Network Netstat - TCP Stat - time_wait
queries.describe: 宿主机TCP处于TIME_WAIT状态的连接数

targets.legendFormat: time_wait - TCP sockets in time_wait state

queries.title: Node Exporter - Node Exporter Scrape Time
queries.describe: Node Exporter采集耗时(秒)

queries.title: Node Exporter - Node Exporter Scrape - Scrape success
queries.describe: Node Exporter采集成功状态(1=成功)
